sentences.english: What if you want to see only the illiteracy rate in Europe?
sentences.chinese: 那么如果只想查看欧洲的文盲率呢？

sentences.english: In a country in which many people are illiterate, this is time-consuming.
sentences.chinese: 在一个大部分公民是文盲的国家，这将是旷日持久的。

sentences.english: These must be some illiterate ignorant and clueless Senators.
sentences.chinese: 这些参议员肯定是文盲蠢蛋毫无头绪的。

sentences.english: Many children in rural areas cannot afford to go to school and become illiterates .
sentences.chinese: 农村地区的许多儿童没钱上学，成了文盲。

sentences.english: The graph shows that illiteracy rates are far lower in Europe than they are worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 图表显示出，欧洲的文盲率远远低于全球水平。

sentences.english: Many of them seem to be barely literate.
sentences.chinese: 其中许多人都是半文盲。

sentences.english: Most of those from his village are illiterate.
sentences.chinese: 他们村绝大部分村民家的孩子都是文盲。

sentences.english: Illiterate people, and our monkey cousins living in the wild, as a rule do not become nearsighted.
sentences.chinese: 文盲，以及在野外生活的猴子群体，通常不会有近视。

sentences.english: The liberation of the early part of the Organization of illiteracy among rural women form a "literacy class."
sentences.chinese: 解放初期，农村组织部分文盲妇女组成“识字班”。

sentences.english: Anti-poverty campaigners can admire their efforts to offer banking services to the illiterate.
sentences.chinese: 反贫困组织给文盲放贷值得钦佩。

sentences.english: Defectors have described him as arthritic and illiterate.
sentences.chinese: 反对者则把他说成是关节炎患者和文盲。

sentences.english: The proudest household pets are now the illiterate butts of caption-based jokes. Icanhasreputashunback?
sentences.chinese: 这种最骄傲的家庭宠物现在在图片笑话上成了文盲。

sentences.english: I could go to the judge and tell him that Hanna was illiterate.
sentences.chinese: 我可以走到法官面前，告诉他说汉娜是文盲。

sentences.english: Around the world, literacy rates continue to climb.
sentences.chinese: 全球范围内，非文盲率继续提高。

sentences.english: Will text messaging produce generations of illiterates?
sentences.chinese: 发短信会造就几代文盲吗？

sentences.english: And many times, the educated and illiterate are competing for the same small pot of jobs.
sentences.chinese: 并多次，受教育和文盲正在争夺相同的工作小火锅。

definition: lit. the eye cannot recognize the letter T (idiom); totally illiterate
person who is ignorant about science and technology/scientific illiteracy
to acquire literacy/to throw off blindness
